ShortDescription: India's largest lending platform. One solution for all life's big and small upgrades.
enhanced_description: EarlySalary is India's largest mobile-first lending platform, established in 2015 and headquartered in Pune, Maharashtra. It leverages a smart risk scoring system to provide fast and easy access to a host of financial products. These include short-term instant cash loans, long-term personal loans, and buy now pay later (BNPL) plans across various sectors such as health, edtech, and consumer technology. The platform aims to evolve with the financial needs of its customers, enabling them to upgrade their lifestyle. While primarily a FinTech brand, EarlySalary is positioned as a solution to improve employee happiness and engagement within organizations.
key_use_cases: Providing short-term instant cash loans to individuals
Offering long-term personal loans to individuals
Facilitating buy now pay later (BNPL) options for products/services in health, edtech, and consumer tech sectors
Serving as an employee financial well-being benefit to improve employee happiness and engagement
competitive_advantages: Mobile-first platform for accessibility and convenience

Offers a fast and easy loan application process
Positioned as India's largest lending platform
primary_users: Individuals seeking loans or BNPL services
